{{cpp/thread/latch/title|count_down}}
{{cpp/thread/latch/navbar}}

{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|1= 
void count_down( std::ptrdiff_t n = 1 );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Atomically decrements the internal counter by {{c|n}} without blocking the caller.

If {{c|n}} is greater than the value of the internal counter or is negative, the behavior is undefined.

This operation [[cpp/atomic/memory_order#Strongly happens-before|strongly happens-before]] all calls that are unblocked on this {{tt|latch}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|n|the value by which the internal counter is decreased}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)

===Exceptions===
Throws {{lc|std::system_error}} with an error code allowed for mutex types on error.
